Posts.Content: Dear May Day , I finished my chemo in October 2016 and I've had it progressively worse over the entire soles of my feet . Eventually I was prescribed Quinnie (the one used fir malaria ) it has helped a lot ask your doctor about it next time you go
Posts.Title: Peripheral neuropathy
